sn3.16:1.2: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
sn3.16:1.3: Atha kho annataro puriso yena raja pasenadi kosalo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ranno pasenadissa kosalassa upakannake arocesi:
sn3.16:1.5: Evam vutte, raja pasenadi kosalo anattamano ahosi.
sn3.16:2.1: Atha kho bhagava rajanam pasenadim kosalam anattamanatam viditva tayam velayam ima gathayo abhasi:
